statement_text: Bird flu has been detected in a fifth Japanese prefecture, the agriculture ministry said on Monday, as a wave of infections at poultry farms sparks Japan's worst outbreak in more than four years.

rationale: 'worst' modifies the noun 'outbreak', not a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Bird flu has been detected in a fifth Japanese prefecture, the agriculture ministry said on Monday, as a wave of infections at poultry farms sparks Japan's worst outbreak in more than four years.
Bird flu has been detected in a fifth Japanese prefecture, the agriculture ministry said on Monday, as a wave of infections at poultry farms sparks Japan's worst outbreak in more than four years.

rationale: The phrase 'worst outbreak' is a superlative + negative noun describing the event.
